Posts.Content: bekasunshine wrote: My mother Jean was just diagnosed with breast cancer, she has a tumor on her left breast that needs to be removed, but we don't have the funds too, please helps us, Jean is the brightest light of our family, guiding and comforting everyone in the family, our family isnt very well off, so we need help, as pathetic as it is, the link to the donation is at the bottom, please think about it, even if you don't donate any, a kind comment goes along way, thank you so much in advance, this is heartbreaking to our family, please consider helping us  www.pledgie.com/campaigns/13674  Please help us  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: My mother has bc.. bekasunshine Leah_S
